title: Triangle Polki Drops - Adorable Hanging Jhumka
materials: Encrusted with White Diamonds. Authentic Hyderabadi Polish for enduring shine.
features: Modern geometric design featuring three stacked, triangular Polki settings. Each Polki is surrounded by a halo of delicate white diamonds, enhancing its brilliance. The open setting allows maximum light penetration, showcasing the natural beauty of the Polki. Classic design is combined with contemporary geometry.
colors: Clear (Polki Diamonds). The warm gold and brilliant white create a timeless color harmony.
occasions: from a Diwali party to a casual get together. Also Suitable for modern Indian weddings
and celebratory events. Elevates everyday style.
description: Timeless design meets contemporary flair, crafted with high-quality materials and Hyderabadi artistry. The unique triangular shape adds a modern twist to traditional Polki jewelry, making it a versatile piece for any wardrobe. Crafted with care and expertise, these earrings are designed to last a lifetime. Polki Diamonds are a timeless stone, promising everlasting value.
